#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int n,count=0,i;

   cin>>n;

   char str[n+1],c;

   cin>>str;

   for(i=1;str[i]!='\0';i++)
   {

      c=str[i-1];

      while(str[i]==c)
      {

        count++;

        i++;

      }


   }

   cout<<count<<endl;

   return 0;

}
